DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the quantity of dimension one used to express on a scale from 0 to 14 the amount-of-substance concentration of hydrogen ion of dilute aqueous solution, calculated as the logarithm of the reciprocal of hydrogen-ion concentration in gram atoms per liter.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Quantity of dimension one used to express on a scale from 0 to 14 the amount-of-substance concentration of hydrogen ion of dilute aqueous solution, calculated as the logarithm of the reciprocal of hydrogen-ion concentration in gram atoms per liter.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: The logarithm of the reciprocal of hydrogen-ion concentration in gram atoms per lite, providing a measure, on a scale from 0 to 14, of the acidity or alkalinity of a solution where less than 7 is acidic, greater than 7 is basic, and 7 is neutral.

Concepts.definition: Quantity of dimension one used to express on a scale from 0 to 14 the amount-of-substance concentration of hydrogen ion of dilute aqueous solution, calculated as the logarithm of the reciprocal of hydrogen-ion concentration in gram atoms per liter.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: Princess Margaret Cancer Centre, Toronto, ON
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Laurence. mc 11/28/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
